channel.title: Donation on Hyunuk Kim
channel.description: Recent content in Donation on Hyunuk Kim

item.title: PRISMING: Blockchain for in-kind donation
item.description: PRISMING, a nonprofit project for in-kind donation, builds private blockchain platform to enhance transparency and efficiency. This project has been supported by Seoul NPO Center. In Aug 2018, I gave two talks: New Kids on the Blockchain, WeWork at Euljiro, Seoul, Republic of Korea, 31 Aug 2018. Crypto on the Beach: Blockchain for Good, Naksan Beach Hotel, Yangyang, Gangwon-do, Republic of Korea, 19 Aug 2018. For the details, please check the project website, http://prisming.
